name: GameArtJam - CuteSadness
description:
A very small exploration game.
Created in a few hours during a Game-Art Jam in Cologne.

Controlls:
W,A,S,D -> Walk
Space -> Jump
R -> Restart
Esc -> Quit

Creators:
Till Gilsbach @fancyN3rd
Olivier Haas @oarleyhass
Tristan Hantschel @tristanarkham
Thomas Wenzler-Horn
Martin Wisniowski @nodepond
